entry.title: Doctor Who Sticky Notes
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Unemployed Philosophers Guild
Type: Collectibles
Price: 6.74

Doctor Who¬†Sticky Notes

Staying organized can be quite a tricky task when traveling between time and dimensions, luckily the Doctor has come up with a fun way to keep track of all your important notes! Don't leave them at The Library, these stickies come in a stylish pocket-sized hardcover featuring the Thirteenth Doctor on the cover.

Included inside are a to-do list pad, blank sheets with a TARDIS, and bookmark tabs with all your favourite Season 11 characters; Graham, Ryan, Yasmin, and the Doctor herself! You'll never have to walk into a TARDIS again and wonder what it is you even went in there for.

Let's get a shift on!

Currently stanning Doctor Who? Check out our Weeping Angel heat changing mug, our¬† Disappearing TARDIS heat changing mug, and our ceramic Genesis of the Daleks Mug!

Stiff Upper¬†Lip Balm

G'day, ol' chum! Feelin' your lips are a bit dry and irritated, are ya? Well no more! Sir Winston Churchill's got your back with this peppermint-flavored formula that'll always come in handy in the nick of time! Leaving your lips feeling soft and refreshed, you'll be saying, "Cheerio, chapped lips"! Even in the face of withered lips, always remember Sir Churchill's words, and never surrender!

Net Weight: 4.25 g

entry.title: Messiah Mints
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Unemployed Philosophers Guild
Type: Collectibles
Price: 4.79

Messiah Mints

Save your breath; Jesus is on the way!

Quick - make sure you have minty-fresh breath.¬† You can't talk to J.C. with garlic breath... yuck.¬† Jesus must have gotten tired of smelling lousy breath at the last supper, so he created¬†Messiah Mints as our saviour.¬† These saintly peppermints not only smell holy but taste of pure cooling freshness.¬† Give it a try the next meal you eat; hopefully it will¬†not be your last supper if you show up with fresh breath!

They aren't delicious, they're sacrelicious!

Flavor:¬†Peppermint

Net Weight: 12 g

¬†

Do you, or does someone in you life need Jesus... themed gifts?¬† Check out the miracle makeover mug featuring the one and only J.C.: M.C. of your life!

Type: Collectibles

Salvador Dali¬†Secular Saint Candle

The Patron Saint of surrealists, realists, and eccentrics, Salvador Dali is a man to be honored.¬† In memory of his great works of art, light this candle to show your appreciation. Whether you want to light your room or set the mood, the 8" candle has a wick that will burn as long as your heart desires.¬† Just be sure not to set this candle under any clocks - they're prone¬†to melting.

The front of the candle shows a portrait of Dali in homage to him and his important works of art. On the back is his Saint's Day, and a prayer in dedication to the great man. An oeuvre fitting to be lit in a museum!¬†

Dimensions: 8" tall, 2" diameter.

entry.title: Frida Dreams Ceramic Coffee Mug
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Unemployed Philosophers Guild
Type: Collectibles
Price: 12.74

Frida Dreams Ceramic Coffee Mug

There are few artists that prove to be as strong and bold as the renowned Mexican painter Frida Kahlo, which is why this mug pairs so perfectly with coffee. Frida's artwork was painted with vigor, many of them haunting self-portraits which spoke to much of the suffering she had endured, a testament echoed by the quote "I never painted my dreams, I only painted my reality", displayed in English and Spanish. A strong woman who surmounted challenging and debilitating obstacles, as well as¬†an openly proud member of the LGBTQ community, Frida Kahlo's legacy will be sure to provide inspiration, motivation, and pride with a hot beverage first thing in the morning.¬†

¬†

This mug is microwave and dishwasher safe.

    Holds 12 oz / 350mL

    Frida Kahlo enthusiast? Check out our other cool products featuring her like¬†this refreshing lip balm, and this stuffed portrait¬†pillow!
